data.message: I'll listen for life but it's kinda hypocritical to bag trump after millions of dollars made off lyrics like "man fuck that do that shit shoot that bitch " and referencing a rape of an underage girl with "man fuck that hit that shit raw dawg then bail" he says that shit just clownin dawg how fucked up is you. Ps not a trumpster just tired of our species hypocrisy . Hope the new albums fire like 95percent of your raps are .
